otherNames: 至尊神皇, Supreme God Emperor
synopsis: Ye Chen, in just twenty short years, rose from an ordinary soldier to become the Great Xia God Emperor, feared by his enemies. Now, Ye Chen is no longer the naive child of the past. With the Dragon-Slaying Spear in hand and bearing a deep-seated grudge, he vows to uncover the truth from years ago and avenge his father. At the same time, he will protect this land and its people in his own way, writing a legendary chapter of his own.
